SEARCH
Package lt.viko.eif.stermen.project1.utility

Class CsvUtility

java.lang.Object
lt.viko.eif.stermen.project1.utility.CsvUtility
public class CsvUtility extends Object
A simple utility class that wraps over the org.apache.commons.csv library. Firstly, the labels of each column are provided to the headers String array. Then parseCsv is used to parse the file. Finally, records object is used to retrieve any and all objects from the parsed file.
